function.name: show_one
function.description: Show a data sample. Presents the original data points. Can de used to display a sample from the dataset.

id.description: The id of the single data sample requested

function.name: show_group
function.description: Show a group of original data points filtered by some features. Presents the original data points only. Can de used to display a sub-selection of the dataset.

indoor_temperature_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of indoor temperature

indoor_temperature_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of outdoor temperature

outdoor_temperature_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of outdoor temperature

outdoor_temperature_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of outdoor temperature

past_electricity_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of past electricity

past_electricity_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of past electricity

function.name: predict_one
function.description: Get a prediction of one data sample. It calls an ML prediction function on given data point to obtain a prediction and return it to the user.

id.description: The id of the single data sample requested

function.name: predict_group
function.description: Get a prediction of a group of data points. It calls an ML prediction function with given data point to obtain predictions and return them to the user.

indoor_temperature_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of indoor temperature

indoor_temperature_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of outdoor temperature

outdoor_temperature_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of outdoor temperature

outdoor_temperature_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of outdoor temperature

past_electricity_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of past electricity

past_electricity_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of past electricity

function.name: explain_one
function.description: Get an explanation of prediction for one data sample. It calls SHAP module with given data point to determine what features are most important for the prediction.

id.description: The id of the single data sample to be explained
